docs.snippet: A new bill would further stigmatize and denigrate gay people....
docs.lead_paragraph: A new bill would further stigmatize and denigrate gay people.
docs.abstract: Editorial criticizes bill in Russian Parliament that would criminalize same-sex public displays of affection; notes Pres Vladimir V Putin supported 2013 law against so-called gay propaganda but has not explicitly backed new bill.

docs.snippet: A British inquiry into the death of ex-KGB spy Alexander Litvinenko, poisoned in London a decade ago with tea laced with a rare radioactive isotope, is likely to conclude Russia was responsible when it publishes its findings on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A British inquiry into the death of ex-KGB spy Alexander Litvinenko, poisoned in London a decade ago with tea laced with a rare radioactive isotope, is likely to conclude Russia was responsible when it publishes its findings on Thursday.
